item.title: How do I make A No-balls Command
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

if (command.startsWith("No balls") && command.length() > 5) { if(p.muted == 1) p.sendMessage("You No longer have balls and can't talk!!!"); else PlayerHandler.messageToAll = p.playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5); }
I want to add that command,Only a gfx of an npc kicking him in teh balls

Read full topic
